title: Pork noodles delight
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '4 to 5 lean boneless pork chops, cut in thin strips', '3 peppers (red, green and yellow), cut in strips', '2 medium carrots, cut in thin strips', '1 large onion, cut in strips', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '250g wheat egg noodles', 'a little salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '250ml warm water, or as needed', '1 egg']
